description: **The Society of Magic (SoM)**, a fan-based community surrounding the illustrious world of witchcraft and wizardry. We're loosely based upon J. K. Rowling's Harry Potter Universe, the Wizarding World and the Muggle World. Embark on a journey to discover hidden spell books at our Adventure map, master the art of dueling, or attend classes at our magical school, Vale. The options are yours!
